about_the_game:
INAYAH - Life after Gods: A Journey of Survival and Discovery

Dive into an exciting 2D action-platformer with Metroidvania elements, where every corner of the post-apocalyptic world comes to life with meticulously hand-drawn visuals. This world is full of dangers, yet its beauty will make you stop and take a breath more than once.

Play as Inayah, an orphaned outcast searching for her lost tribe in a world where brutal clans rule over the ruins of a once high-tech civilization. Along the way, she will face intense trials, deadly battles, and life-changing decisions.

PLAY DEMO NOW!

The wait is over — our new demo is now live! Get ready to explore a beautifully hand-drawn world and battle fearsome enemies in our new exclusive demo.

What’s in the Demo?

  • Three Boss Fights – Test your skills against powerful foes, each with unique mechanics.

  • Two Biomes to Explore – Journey through breathtaking environments filled with mystery and danger.

  • Three Weapon Forms – Switch between Blades, Fists, and a Flail, each with unique abilities, combos and an individual progression tree.

  • Upgrades for your character – find enhancements for your injector and implant system to improve your abilities.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 / AMD Athlon X4
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 / AMD R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 Skylake / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: INAYAH – Life After Gods is a thrilling action-platformer with metroidvania elements. Immerse yourself in a story with multiple choices, explore diverse biomes, face more than 20 bosses, and develop your character with a unique progression system.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
